name: Donna
text: BJ's provides a more pleasant shopping experience than other clubs or large stores. I don't go for the prices, actually, since clubs (lately) are about as expensive as supermarkets and other retailers. Sometimes, however, you find things at Bj's that you won't find elsewhere.

name: Dee
text: Great place to shop, definitely when planning a large event.

name: Walter
text: Excelente

text: Great shopping experience

name: Mark
text: This was a great deal to try it out.

name: JASMIN
text: I think the Groupon should have been redeemable at ALL locations. Other than that it was easy to redeem and was a quick process.

name: Stephanie
text: Great deal and the staff we met gave us a great first impression of BJs. Extremely helpful..

name: Jonathan
text: Do not email me.

text: Is great! Excellent prices! I found a delicious bread and the meat department is great!

text: Great membership staff at south Florida Marlin location.

text: Great deal, never been there before I will definitely renew.

text: Incredibly easy to use groupon & sign up for membership.

text: The agent that did the registration for me, tell me that this membership is only for one person and I have to pay for the second. Person . All other things are perfect. Thanks

text: I love this store

text: The coupons they gave me when I issued the membership were very helpful as well as the 25 dollars gift card.

text: They carry a wide variety of products. I'm happy I purchased the membership.

text: This was an awesome offer.

text: We love BJ's. they have more brands that we use, & accept manufacturer coupons.

text: Redeeming my groupon was simple and I'm now ready for a year of savings at BJs.

text: That was such a great deal. Thanks!

text: Best groupon yet!

name: Jeremy
text: This was a great deal and everyone needs to take advantage of it!

name: Gladys
text: Good deal.

name: Jacqui
text: The customer service sucked at the first store and on the phone. I then went to the location in Pembroke Pines and they were great. I was helped in less than 10 minutes by Heather with no problem. It shouldn't take me driving almost an hour away to get proper assistance.
